headline: Pelosi Quietly Dropped Huge Spending Bill At 2:30AM For Vote Just Hours Later
author: Natalie Argyle
sentences:
That’s on top of the $4.1 billion they’re getting for operations support, of course pic.twitter.com/CB4SDiMsU0

On page 1,556, of the $1.5 Trillion dollar Omnibus bill that Democrats are still fighting over, I just thought I’d let y’all know that we are going to fund $17,000,000 “to build and maintain safe latrines” in developing countries.

Watch his full discussion with @TBatesNews and @JRiveraRAV on #AVAM: https://t.co/rtp07r8tWm pic.twitter.com/5U75xvd10O

Literally in the DARK OF NIGHT, the Democrat controlled Rules Committee met at 1:30 am – 2:30 am and passed the HORRENDOUS $1.5 TRILLION Omnibus bill.

“That is a DISGUSTING display by BOTH SIDES of this body…STOP selling the American people a bill of goods, and I’m looking directly at my party when I say that.” pic.twitter.com/wuwGRm59tS

What’s AZOV, you ask?

Do you think it’s even POSSIBLE for your representatives to know exactly what it was that they were voting on, considering they had less than 8 hours to sift through 2741 pages of technical legal jargon?
Do you think our elected representatives in government care that it’s obvious to the American people that the couldn’t possibly know everything that was in it when they voted on it?
And since we’re almost $30 trillion in debt already, I guess they also don’t care all that much about the historic and daily increasing inflation Americans are facing today.
While you were sleeping, and in the midst of historic inflation and a historic spending deficit, your government representatives dropped another massive spending bill.
